Basic Ball.name: Basic Ball
Basic Ball.description: A simple ball. Can be evolved into an Advanced Ball.

Advanced Ball.name: Advanced Ball
Advanced Ball.description: An advanced upgrade of the Basic Ball.

Stickman.name: Stickman
Stickman.description: A simple stick figure. Can be upgraded with wood

Wooden Stickman.name: Wooden Stickman
Wooden Stickman.description: A stick figure made out of wood. Stronger than a regular Stickman.

Dog.name: Dog
Dog.description: A loyal companion. Can be evolved into a Wolf.

Wolf.name: Wolf
Wolf.description: A wild canine. Can come together with others to form a Wolf Pack.

Wolf Pack.name: Wolf Pack
Wolf Pack.description: A pack of wolves. Stronger together.

Bug.name: Bug
Bug.description: A small bug. Can infest walls.

Infested Wall.name: Infested Wall
Infested Wall.description: A wall infested with bugs. Dangerous to touch.

Honda Civic.name: Honda Civic
Honda Civic.description: A reliable car. Known for its fuel efficiency.

Bergentruck.name: Bergentruck
Bergentruck.description: A heavy-duty truck. Can run over a deer right after a beer.

Laptop.name: Laptop
Laptop.description: A portable computer. Can be upgraded to a Pc.

Pc.name: Pc
Pc.description: A personal computer. More powerful than a Laptop.

Server.name: Server
Server.description: A powerful server. Can be housed in a Server Room.

Server Room.name: Server Room
Server Room.description: A room full of servers. Extremely powerful.

Wool.name: Wool
Wool.description: Soft and fluffy. Can be spun into Cloth.

Cloth.name: Cloth
Cloth.description: A piece of fabric. Can be sewn into a Hoodie.

Hoodie.name: Hoodie
Hoodie.description: A comfortable hoodie. Keeps you warm.

Pickaxe.name: Pickaxe
Pickaxe.description: A tool for mining. Can be upgraded to a Diamond Pickaxe.

Diamond Pickaxe.name: Diamond Pickaxe
Diamond Pickaxe.description: A pickaxe made of diamond. Extremely durable.

Paper.name: Paper
Paper.description: A sheet of paper. Can be used for writing.

Book.name: Book
Book.description: A book made from paper. Can contain stories.

Trilogy.name: Trilogy
Trilogy.description: A set of three books. Can be evolved into something darker.

Dark.name: Dark
Dark.description: The first EvoSpin Playtester. A truly gifted author.

Algebra 1.name: Algebra 1
Algebra 1.description: A basic math course covering fundamental algebraic concepts.

Geometry.name: Geometry
Geometry.description: A math course focusing on the properties and relations of points, lines, surfaces, and solids.

Algebra 2.name: Algebra 2
Algebra 2.description: An advanced math course that builds on Algebra 1 and introduces complex numbers and functions.

Precalculus.name: Precalculus
Precalculus.description: A math course that prepares students for calculus by covering topics such as functions, trigonometry, and complex numbers.

Calculus.name: Calculus
Calculus.description: A branch of mathematics that studies continuous change, including concepts such as limits, derivatives, and integrals.

Multivariable Calculus.name: Multivariable Calculus
Multivariable Calculus.description: An advanced calculus course that extends the concepts of single-variable calculus to functions of multiple variables.

Statistics.name: Statistics
Statistics.description: The study of data collection, analysis, interpretation, and presentation.

Holy Roman Empire.name: Holy Roman Empire
Holy Roman Empire.description: An empire in Central Europe that existed from the medieval period until its dissolution in 1806.

North German Confederation.name: North German Confederation
North German Confederation.description: A federal state in northern Germany that existed from 1867 to 1871, preceding the German Empire.

German Empire.name: German Empire
German Empire.description: The German Empire, also known as the Second Reich, was the unified German nation-state that existed from 1871 to 1918.

Weimar Republic.name: Weimar Republic
Weimar Republic.description: The Weimar Republic was the democratic government that ruled Germany from 1919 to 1933, following World War I and preceding the rise of the Third Reich.

Third Reich.name: Third Reich
Third Reich.description: The Third Reich, also known as the Nazi regime, was the period of Nazi rule in Germany from 1933 to 1945.

Ddr-Brd.name: Ddr-Brd
Ddr-Brd.description: The period of division in Germany from 1949 to 1990, when the country was split into East Germany (DDR) and West Germany (BRD), before reunification.

Germany.name: Germany
Germany.description: The modern nation of Germany, reunified in 1990 and known for its rich history, culture, and economic strength.

Reichtangle.name: Reichtangle
Reichtangle.description: The Fourth Reich. Guten Tag Poland.

Equinox.name: Equinox
Equinox.description: A celestial being that embodies the balance of day and night. A rare and powerful entity among EvoSpinners.

Sovereign Dragonlord.name: Sovereign Dragonlord
Sovereign Dragonlord.description: A majestic dragon of immense power and wisdom, ruling over the skies with an iron claw. A legendary figure among EvoSpinners.

Spectral Phoenix.name: Spectral Phoenix
Spectral Phoenix.description: A mythical bird reborn from ethereal flames, the Spectral Phoenix radiates power and mystery. Its rare appearance is said to bring fortune to those who witness it.

Sky Dragon.name: Sky Dragon
Sky Dragon.description: A mythical dragon that soars through the skies. A symbol of power and freedom.

Water Drop.name: Water Drop
Water Drop.description: A single drop of water. Can evaporate to form a Cloud.

Cloud.name: Cloud
Cloud.description: A fluffy cloud in the sky. Can condense to form Rain.

Rain.name: Rain
Rain.description: Falling water droplets from the sky. Can intensify to form a Storm.

Storm.name: Storm
Storm.description: A powerful weather event with heavy rain and strong winds. Can evolve into a Random Storm.

Random Storm.name: Random Storm
Random Storm.description: A friend of Dark, a devoted EvoSpinner.

Cosmic Leviathan.name: Cosmic Leviathan
Cosmic Leviathan.description: A mythical sea creature said to dwell in the depths of space. During times of Solar Eclipse, it is said to transcend to a higher form.

Leviathan Of The Eclipse.name: Leviathan Of The Eclipse
Leviathan Of The Eclipse.description: An even more mythical form of the Cosmic Leviathan, said to appear only during a total Solar Eclipse. A true legend among EvoSpinners.

Bluejay.name: Bluejay
Bluejay.description: A vibrant blue bird known for its intelligence and complex social behavior. Can evolve into Codebluejay.

Codebluejay.name: Codebluejay
Codebluejay.description: The creator of EvoSpin, a legendary EvoSpinner.

Lieand.name: Lieand
Lieand.description: A notable figure in the EvoSpin community, known for his contributions and presence.

Gay.name: Gay
Gay.description: The next evolution of Lieand, representing a significant milestone.

Thunder Basilisk.name: Thunder Basilisk
Thunder Basilisk.description: A mythical creature known for its electrifying presence and legendary status among EvoSpinners.

Missingsdex.name: Missingsdex
Missingsdex.description: A Ballsdex spinoff created by asianantking8064

Thaitangle.name: Thaitangle
Thaitangle.description: Thaitangle is the legendary rectangle representing thailand.

George Washingmyhands.name: George Washingmyhands
George Washingmyhands.description: A historical figure known for his leadership and hygiene.

Ant.name: Ant
Ant.description: The friend of Codebluejay, a notable figure in the EvoSpin community.

Queen Ant.name: Queen Ant
Queen Ant.description: The ruler of the ant colony, known for her leadership and strength.

Fokker Dr.1.name: Fokker Dr.1
Fokker Dr.1.description: A World War I fighter aircraft known for its distinctive triplane design.

Bf.109.name: Bf.109
Bf.109.description: A German fighter aircraft that was one of the most advanced of its time.

Ju87 Stuka.name: Ju87 Stuka
Ju87 Stuka.description: A German dive bomber and ground-attack aircraft used during World War II.

Me262.name: Me262
Me262.description: The world's first operational jet-powered fighter aircraft, used by Germany during World War II.

Panavia Tornado.name: Panavia Tornado
Panavia Tornado.description: A multirole combat aircraft developed and used by several European nations.

Eurofighter Typhoon.name: Eurofighter Typhoon
Eurofighter Typhoon.description: A highly advanced multirole fighter aircraft used by several European air forces.

P51 Mustang.name: P51 Mustang
P51 Mustang.description: An American long-range, single-seat fighter and fighter-bomber used during World War II and the Korean War.

F86 Sabre.name: F86 Sabre
F86 Sabre.description: A transonic jet fighter aircraft developed by North American Aviation. It was the United States' first swept-wing fighter.

F4 Phantom.name: F4 Phantom
F4 Phantom.description: A tandem two-seat, twin-engine, long-range supersonic jet interceptor and fighter-bomber originally developed by McDonnell Aircraft for the United States Navy.

F15 Eagle.name: F15 Eagle
F15 Eagle.description: An American twin-engine, all-weather tactical fighter aircraft designed by McDonnell Douglas to gain and maintain air supremacy in aerial combat.

F22 Raptor.name: F22 Raptor
F22 Raptor.description: A fifth-generation, single-seat, twin-engine, all-weather stealth tactical fighter aircraft developed for the United States Air Force.

Strike Gundam.name: Strike Gundam
Strike Gundam.description: A versatile mobile suit from the Gundam SEED series, known for its adaptability in various combat situations.

Freedom Gundam.name: Freedom Gundam
Freedom Gundam.description: A powerful mobile suit from the Gundam SEED series, known for its advanced technology and combat capabilities.

Strike Freedom Gundam.name: Strike Freedom Gundam
Strike Freedom Gundam.description: An upgraded version of the Freedom Gundam, featuring enhanced weaponry and mobility.

Rising Freedom Gundam.name: Rising Freedom Gundam
Rising Freedom Gundam.description: A further enhanced version of the Strike Freedom Gundam, boasting superior firepower and agility.

Strike Freedom Gundam Type 2.name: Strike Freedom Gundam Type 2
Strike Freedom Gundam Type 2.description: The ultimate evolution of the Strike Freedom Gundam, equipped with cutting-edge technology and unparalleled combat prowess.

Mighty Strike Freedom Gundam.name: Mighty Strike Freedom Gundam
Mighty Strike Freedom Gundam.description: The pinnacle of mobile suit evolution, the Mighty Strike Freedom Gundam represents the zenith of engineering and combat capability.

Carrot.name: Carrot
Carrot.description: A crunchy vegetable. Can be evolved into a Strawberry.

Strawberry.name: Strawberry
Strawberry.description: A sweet fruit. Can be evolved into a Blueberry.

Blueberry.name: Blueberry
Blueberry.description: A sweet fruit. Can be evolved into Orange Tulip.

Orange Tulip.name: Orange Tulip
Orange Tulip.description: A beautiful flower. Can be evolved into a Tomato.

Tomato.name: Tomato
Tomato.description: A juicy fruit. Can be evolved into a Daffodil.

Daffodil.name: Daffodil
Daffodil.description: A beautiful flower. Can be evolved into Corn.

Corn.name: Corn
Corn.description: A staple crop. Can be evolved into Watermelon.

Watermelon.name: Watermelon
Watermelon.description: A refreshing fruit. Can be evolved into Pumpkin.

Pumpkin.name: Pumpkin
Pumpkin.description: A large fruit often associated with autumn and Halloween. Can be evolved into Apple.

Apple.name: Apple
Apple.description: A popular fruit known for its crisp texture and sweet flavor. Can be evolved into Bamboo.

Bamboo.name: Bamboo
Bamboo.description: A fast-growing plant known for its strength and versatility. Can be evolved into Coconut.

Coconut.name: Coconut
Coconut.description: A tropical fruit known for its hard shell and refreshing water. Can be evolved into Cactus.

Cactus.name: Cactus
Cactus.description: A resilient plant adapted to arid environments. Can be evolved into Dragon Fruit.

Dragon Fruit.name: Dragon Fruit
Dragon Fruit.description: A vibrant fruit known for its unique appearance and sweet taste. Can be evolved into Mango.

Mango.name: Mango
Mango.description: A tropical fruit celebrated for its juicy flesh and rich flavor. Can be evolved into Mushroom.

Mushroom.name: Mushroom
Mushroom.description: A fungi known for its culinary and medicinal uses. Can be evolved into Grape.

Grape.name: Grape
Grape.description: A small fruit often used to make wine. Can be evolved into Pepper.

Pepper.name: Pepper
Pepper.description: A spice known for its pungent flavor. Can be evolved into Cacao.

Cacao.name: Cacao
Cacao.description: The seed from which chocolate is made. Can be evolved into Beanstalk.

Beanstalk.name: Beanstalk
Beanstalk.description: A giant plant that reaches the sky. Can be evolved into Ember Lily.

Ember Lily.name: Ember Lily
Ember Lily.description: A fiery flower that blooms with intense heat. Can be evolved into Sugar Apple.

Sugar Apple.name: Sugar Apple
Sugar Apple.description: A sweet fruit known for its creamy texture. Can be evolved into Crimson Thorn.

Elder Strawberry.name: Elder Strawberry
Elder Strawberry.description: A rare and ancient variety of strawberry, known for its exceptional flavor and longevity.

Romanesco.name: Romanesco
Romanesco.description: A unique vegetable known for its fractal-like appearance and vibrant green color. Can be evolved into Crimson Thorn.

Crimson Thorn.name: Crimson Thorn
Crimson Thorn.description: The final evolution in the food chain, representing the pinnacle of growth and transformation.

Cool Anteater.name: Cool Anteater
Cool Anteater.description: An anteater with a cool demeanor and style. A rare find among EvoSpinners.

Samsung Galaxy S25 Ultra.name: Samsung Galaxy S25 Ultra
Samsung Galaxy S25 Ultra.description: The latest and greatest smartphone from Samsung, featuring cutting-edge technology and design.

Ultra Frog.name: Ultra Frog
Ultra Frog.description: A legendary frog with extraordinary abilities. A true rarity among EvoSpinners.
